welcome_message_body: Welcome to Kohat, Pakistan! Get ready to experience the charm and beauty of this historic city known for its rich cultural heritage and stunning natural landscapes. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Kohat has to offer.

restaurants.name: Munch
restaurants.description: Munch is a fast food restaurant located in Kohāt.

restaurants.name: Food Corner, Kohat
restaurants.description: Food Corner, Kohat is a food court located in the city.

restaurants.name: Texas Wings & Grill
restaurants.description: Texas Wings & Grill is a restaurant located in Kohāt.
restaurants.address: afridi arcade pindi road togh bala kohat near sherzaman cng (pindi by pass), Kohat-26000

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kohat Airport serves domestic flights to major cities in Pakistan.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Kohat Airport handles the transportation of goods and packages.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
